trans-unit.source: Provides application-management functions and application services to a managed application within its application domain.
trans-unit.target: 在托管应用程序的应用程序域内向托管应用程序提供应用程序管理功能和应用程序服务。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: Each managed application domain contains a static instance of the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment> class, which provides access to application-management functions and application services.
trans-unit.target: 每个托管应用程序域包含的静态实例<xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment>类，该类提供对应用程序管理功能和应用程序服务的访问。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is a webpage that displays the application information available from the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment> object.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例是一个显示可从应用程序信息的网页<xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment>对象。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.%23ctor%2A> constructor initializes the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.%23ctor%2A>构造函数初始化<xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.%23ctor%2A> constructor is called only once by the application's <xref:System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.%23ctor%2A>构造函数由应用程序的一次调用<xref:System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager>对象。

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.%23ctor%2A> constructor more than once will cause an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> exception to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.%23ctor%2A>构造函数超过一次将导致<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.#ctor" /> constructor is called more than once.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.#ctor" /> 构造函数被调用多次。

trans-unit.source: This property supports the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此属性支持 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 基础结构，不能在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains information about the application host.
trans-unit.target: 包含有关应用程序宿主的信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets the unique identifier of the application.
trans-unit.target: 获取应用程序的唯一标识符。

trans-unit.source: The unique identifier of the application.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序的唯一标识符。

trans-unit.source: The application must be running with <xref:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel> set to high trust to access the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.ApplicationID%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序必须运行与<xref:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel>设置为高信任级别，以访问<xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.ApplicationID%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a group of repleacable monitor objects used by ASP.NET subsystems to maintain application health.
trans-unit.target: 获取 ASP.NET 子系统用于维护应用程序运行状况的一组可替换监视器对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets the physical path on disk to the application's directory.
trans-unit.target: 获取磁盘上指向应用程序目录的物理路径。

trans-unit.source: The physical path on disk to the application's directory.
trans-unit.target: 磁盘上指向应用程序目录的物理路径。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.ApplicationPhysicalPath%2A> property to construct a path to a data file in the application's App_Data directory.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.ApplicationPhysicalPath%2A>属性来构造应用程序的 App_Data 目录中的数据文件的路径。

trans-unit.source: For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider> class overview topic.
trans-unit.target: 有关所需要运行该示例的完整代码，请参阅示例部分<xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider>类概述主题。

trans-unit.source: Gets the root virtual path of the application.
trans-unit.target: 获取应用程序的根虚拟路径。

trans-unit.source: The root virtual path of the application with no trailing slash (/).
trans-unit.target: 应用程序的不带尾部反斜杠 (/) 的根虚拟路径。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.ApplicationVirtualPath%2A> property always returns "`/"` as the first character of the returned value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.ApplicationVirtualPath%2A>属性始终返回"`/"`作为返回值的第一个字符。

trans-unit.source: If the application is located in the root of the website, the return value is just "`/"`.
trans-unit.target: 如果在网站的根目录中位于应用程序，则返回的值只是"`/"`。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.Cache" /> instance for the current application.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前应用程序的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.Cache" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: The current <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.Cache" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 当前的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.Cache" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: Reduces the count of busy objects in the hosted environment by one.
trans-unit.target: 将宿主环境中繁忙对象的计数减一。

trans-unit.source: When a busy registered object finishes its work, it calls the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.DecrementBusyCount%2A> method to signal the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment> object that it has completed processing and to reduce the count of busy objects by one.
trans-unit.target: 当繁忙的已注册的对象完成其工作时，它将调用<xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.DecrementBusyCount%2A>方法用信号通知<xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment>对象它已完成处理并逐个减少繁忙对象的计数。

trans-unit.source: If the busy count is greater than zero, the hosting application will not time out even if there are no pending requests.
trans-unit.target: 如果繁忙计数大于零，主机应用程序将不会超时，即使没有挂起的请求。

trans-unit.source: There must be a call to the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.DecrementBusyCount%2A> method for each call to the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.IncrementBusyCount%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 必须调用<xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.DecrementBusyCount%2A>每次调用的方法<xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.IncrementBusyCount%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Allows code to impersonate a different user.
trans-unit.target: 允许代码模拟不同的用户。

trans-unit.source: Impersonates the user represented by the application identity.
trans-unit.target: 模拟应用程序标识所表示的用户。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IDisposable" /> object that represents the Windows user prior to impersonation; this object can be used to revert to the original user's context.
trans-unit.target: 表示模拟之前的 Windows 用户的 <see cref="T:System.IDisposable" /> 对象，该对象可以用于恢复为原始用户的上下文。

trans-unit.source: The process cannot impersonate.
trans-unit.target: 该进程无法模拟。

trans-unit.source: The handle of a Windows account token.
trans-unit.target: Windows 帐户标记的句柄。

trans-unit.source: Impersonates the user represented by the specified user token.
trans-unit.target: 模拟指定用户标记表示的用户。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IDisposable" /> object that represents the Windows user prior to impersonation; this object can be used to revert to the original user's context.
trans-unit.target: 表示模拟之前的 Windows 用户的 <see cref="T:System.IDisposable" /> 对象，该对象可以用于恢复为原始用户的上下文。

trans-unit.source: The process cannot impersonate.
trans-unit.target: 该进程无法模拟。

trans-unit.source: The handle of a Windows account token.
trans-unit.target: Windows 帐户标记的句柄。

trans-unit.source: The path to the requested resource.
trans-unit.target: 所请求资源的路径。

trans-unit.source: Impersonates the user specified by the configuration settings for the specified virtual path, or the specified user token.
trans-unit.target: 模拟由指定虚拟路径的配置设置或由指定用户标记所指定的用户。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IDisposable" /> object that represents the Windows user prior to impersonation; this object can be used to revert to the original user's context.
trans-unit.target: 表示模拟之前的 Windows 用户的 <see cref="T:System.IDisposable" /> 对象，该对象可以用于恢复为原始用户的上下文。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.Impersonate%2A> method impersonates the user that results after applying all elements in the configuration settings affecting the specified virtual path.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.Impersonate%2A>方法来模拟结果应用影响指定的虚拟路径的配置设置中的所有元素后的用户。

trans-unit.source: If an `identity` element is not specified for the virtual path, the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.Impersonate%2A> method impersonates the specified Windows account.
trans-unit.target: 如果`identity`元素未指定的虚拟路径，<xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.Impersonate%2A>方法来模拟指定的 Windows 帐户。

trans-unit.source: The process cannot impersonate.
trans-unit.target: 该进程无法模拟。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the hosting environment has access to the ASP.NET build system.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示宿主环境是否具有对 ASP.NET 生成系统的访问权。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the application domain is the ASP.NET hosted application domain used in <see langword="ClientBuildManager" /> scenarios; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果应用程序域为 <see langword="true" /> 方案中使用的 ASP.NET 借宿应用程序域，则为 <see langword="ClientBuildManager" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Increases the count of busy objects in the hosted environment by one.
trans-unit.target: 将宿主环境中繁忙对象的计数加一。

trans-unit.source: Registered objects signal the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment> object that it is running and to increase the count of busy objects by one.
trans-unit.target: 已注册的对象发出信号通知<xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment>它正在运行的对象，并通过一个增加繁忙对象的计数。

trans-unit.source: If the busy count is greater than zero, the hosting application will not time out even if there are no pending requests.
trans-unit.target: 如果繁忙计数大于零，主机应用程序将不会超时，即使没有挂起的请求。

trans-unit.source: There must be a call to the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.DecrementBusyCount%2A> method for each call to the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.IncrementBusyCount%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 必须调用<xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.DecrementBusyCount%2A>每次调用的方法<xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.IncrementBusyCount%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets any exception thrown during initialization of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取在 <see cref="T:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment" /> 对象初始化期间引发的任何异常。

trans-unit.source: The exception thrown during initialization of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment" /> 对象期间引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: If no exception was thrown, returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果未引发任何异常，则返回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gives the <see cref="T:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment" /> object an infinite lifetime by preventing a lease from being created.
trans-unit.target: 通过阻止创建租约给予 <see cref="T:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment" /> 对象无限的生存期。

trans-unit.source: Always <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 总是为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This method overrides the <xref:System.MarshalByRefObject.InitializeLifetimeService%2A> method in its base class.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将替代<xref:System.MarshalByRefObject.InitializeLifetimeService%2A>其基类中的方法。

trans-unit.source: It always returns `null` and prevents a lease from being created that would limit the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment> object's lifetime.
trans-unit.target: 它始终返回`null`，防止创建租约，会限制<xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment>对象的生存期。

trans-unit.source: Starts shutting down the web application associated with this host and removes registered objects from the system.
trans-unit.target: 开始关闭与此宿主关联的 Web 应用程序，并从系统中移除注册对象。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.InitiateShutdown%2A> method to stop a web application domain and remove any objects registered with the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.RegisterObject%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.InitiateShutdown%2A>方法停止 web 应用程序域并删除任何对象注册<xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.RegisterObject%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This method returns immediately, before the shutdown is complete.
trans-unit.target: 完成关闭操作之前，此方法将立即返回。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Hosting.IRegisteredObject.Stop%2A> method is called on each registered object with the passed parameter set to `false` to allow each registered object to shut down asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Hosting.IRegisteredObject.Stop%2A>传递的参数设置为对每个已注册的对象调用方法`false`才能允许以异步方式关闭每个已注册的对象。

trans-unit.source: After waiting for the amount of time specified in the `shutdownTimeout` attribute of the configuration element, the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.IRegisteredObject.Stop%2A> method is called again with the passed parameter set to `true` for each registered object remaining.
trans-unit.target: 在中指定的时间等待后`shutdownTimeout`配置元素的属性<xref:System.Web.Hosting.IRegisteredObject.Stop%2A>方法再次调用传递的参数设置为`true`剩余的每个已注册对象。

trans-unit.source: Once all registered objects have finished shutting down, the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment> objects shuts down the application domain.
trans-unit.target: 所有已注册的对象完成的情况下，关闭后<xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment>对象关闭应用程序域。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicats whether the current application is in a development environment.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示当前应用程序是否处于开发环境。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the application is in a development environment; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果应用程序在开发环境中，则为，<see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the current application domain is being hosted by an <see cref="T:System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示当前应用程序域是否在由 <see cref="T:System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager" /> 对象承载。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the application domain is hosted by an <see cref="T:System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager" /> object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果该应用程序域在由 <see cref="T:System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager" /> 对象承载，则为 <see langword="true" />，否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The virtual path (absolute or relative).
trans-unit.target: 虚拟路径（绝对路径或相对路径）。

trans-unit.source: Maps a virtual path to a physical path on the server.
trans-unit.target: 将虚拟路径映射到服务器上的物理路径。

trans-unit.source: The physical path on the server specified by <paramref name="virtualPath" />.
trans-unit.target: 由 <paramref name="virtualPath" /> 指定的服务器物理路径。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum concurrent requests per CPU.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置每 CPU 的最大并发请求数。

trans-unit.source: The maximum concurrent requests per CPU.
trans-unit.target: 每 CPU 的最大并发请求数。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum concurrent threads per CPU.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置每 CPU 的最大并发线程数。

trans-unit.source: The maximum concurrent threads per CPU.
trans-unit.target: 每 CPU 的最大并发线程数。

trans-unit.source: This method supports the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法支持 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 基础结构，不能在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: [Supported in the .NET Framework 4.5.2 and later versions]
trans-unit.target: [仅在 .NET Framework 4.5.2 及更高版本中受支持]

trans-unit.source: Schedules a task which can run in the background, independent of any request.
trans-unit.target: 计划可以在后台运行（与任何请求无关）的任务。

trans-unit.source: This overloaded method doesn’t flow the <see cref="T:System.Threading.ExecutionContext" /> or <see cref="T:System.Security.SecurityContext" /> from the caller to the callee.
trans-unit.target: 重载方法不会将 <see cref="T:System.Threading.ExecutionContext" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Security.SecurityContext" /> 从调用方流入被调用方。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, members of those objects, such as the <see cref="P:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal" /> property, will not flow from the caller to the callee.
trans-unit.target: 因此，这些对象的成员（例如 <see cref="P:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal" /> 属性）将不会从调用方流入被调用方。

trans-unit.source: A unit of execution.
trans-unit.target: 执行方式。

trans-unit.source: [Supported in the .NET Framework 4.5.2 and later versions]
trans-unit.target: [仅在 .NET Framework 4.5.2 及更高版本中受支持]

trans-unit.source: Schedules a task which can run in the background, independent of any request.
trans-unit.target: 计划可以在后台运行（与任何请求无关）的任务。

trans-unit.source: Differs from a normal ThreadPool work item in that ASP.NET can keep track of how many work items registered through this API are currently running, and the ASP.NET runtime will try to delay AppDomain shutdown until these work items have finished executing.
trans-unit.target: 正常的线程池工作项与不同的 ASP.NET 可以跟踪的多少工作项通过此 API 注册当前正在运行，和 ASP.NET 运行时将尝试对延迟 AppDomain 关闭这些工作项，直到完成执行。

trans-unit.source: This API cannot be called outside of an ASP.NET-managed AppDomain.
trans-unit.target: 无法在 ASP.NET 托管的 AppDomain 外部调用此 API。

trans-unit.source: The provided CancellationToken will be signaled when the application is shutting down.
trans-unit.target: 当应用程序关闭时，将终止提供的 CancellationToken。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.QueueBackgroundWorkItem%2A> takes a Task-returning callback; the work item will be considered finished when the callback returns.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.QueueBackgroundWorkItem%2A> 采用返回任务的回调;工作项将被视为完成时在回调返回。

trans-unit.source: A unit of execution.
trans-unit.target: 执行方式。

trans-unit.source: [Supported in the .NET Framework 4.5.2 and later versions]
trans-unit.target: [仅在 .NET Framework 4.5.2 及更高版本中受支持]

trans-unit.source: Schedules a task which can run in the background, independent of any request.
trans-unit.target: 计划可以在后台运行（与任何请求无关）的任务。

trans-unit.source: Differs from a normal ThreadPool work item in that ASP.NET can keep track of how many work items registered through this API are currently running, and the ASP.NET runtime will try to delay AppDomain shutdown until these work items have finished executing.
trans-unit.target: 正常的线程池工作项与不同的 ASP.NET 可以跟踪的多少工作项通过此 API 注册当前正在运行，和 ASP.NET 运行时将尝试对延迟 AppDomain 关闭这些工作项，直到完成执行。

trans-unit.source: This API cannot be called outside of an ASP.NET-managed AppDomain.
trans-unit.target: 无法在 ASP.NET 托管的 AppDomain 外部调用此 API。

trans-unit.source: The provided CancellationToken will be signaled when the application is shutting down.
trans-unit.target: 当应用程序关闭时，将终止提供的 CancellationToken。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.QueueBackgroundWorkItem%2A> takes a Task-returning callback; the work item will be considered finished when the returned Task transitions to a terminal state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.QueueBackgroundWorkItem%2A> 采用返回任务的回调;工作项将被视为完成时返回的任务转换为终止状态。

trans-unit.source: The object to register.
trans-unit.target: 要注册的对象。

trans-unit.source: Places an object in the list of registered objects for the application.
trans-unit.target: 将一个对象放在应用程序的已注册对象列表中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager> class enables methods outside the current application domain to create, manage, and destroy objects inside the current application domain.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager>类使当前的应用程序域，以创建、 管理和销毁当前的应用程序域内的对象之外的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.RegisterObject%2A> method is used to register previously created objects with the hosting environment.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.RegisterObject%2A>方法用于向宿主环境注册以前创建的对象。

trans-unit.source: Objects registered with the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.RegisterObject%2A> method must implement the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.IRegisteredObject> interface.
trans-unit.target: 使用注册对象<xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.RegisterObject%2A>方法必须实现<xref:System.Web.Hosting.IRegisteredObject>接口。

trans-unit.source: To use a registered object, follow these steps:
trans-unit.target: 若要使用的已注册的对象，请按照下列步骤：

trans-unit.source: Create a new instance of your registered object by calling the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager.CreateObject%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用创建的已注册对象的新实例<xref:System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager.CreateObject%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: Call a type-specific method to initialize your new object.
trans-unit.target: 调用特定类型的方法，以初始化新对象。

trans-unit.source: In the initialization method, call the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.RegisterObject%2A> method to add the object to the list of registered objects.
trans-unit.target: 在初始化方法中，调用<xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.RegisterObject%2A>方法将该对象添加到的已注册对象列表。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager.GetObject%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to return the registered object when required.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager.GetObject%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法以返回已注册的对象在需要时。

trans-unit.source: When you wish to stop your object, call the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager.StopObject%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 当你想要停止你的对象时，调用<xref:System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager.StopObject%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager.StopObject%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method in turn calls the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.IRegisteredObject.Stop%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager.StopObject%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法反过来调用<xref:System.Web.Hosting.IRegisteredObject.Stop%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.IRegisteredObject.Stop%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, have your object call the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.UnregisterObject%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 在<xref:System.Web.Hosting.IRegisteredObject.Stop%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，具有对象调用<xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.UnregisterObject%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is an implementation of a `Start` method for a registered object.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例是实现的`Start`已注册的对象的方法。

trans-unit.source: For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.IRegisteredObject> interface overview topic.
trans-unit.target: 有关所需要运行该示例的完整代码，请参阅示例部分<xref:System.Web.Hosting.IRegisteredObject>接口概述主题。

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="T:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider" /> instance to add to the compilation system.
trans-unit.target: 要添加到编译系统中的新的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: Registers a new <see cref="T:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider" /> instance with the ASP.NET compilation system.
trans-unit.target: 在 ASP.NET 编译系统中注册新的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.RegisterVirtualPathProvider%2A> method adds the specified <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider> instance to the application's list of virtual-path providers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.RegisterVirtualPathProvider%2A>方法将添加指定<xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider>到应用程序的列表的虚拟路径提供程序的实例。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider>类概述。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is part of an application startup method that registers a custom <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider> instance with the compilation system.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例摘自注册一个自定义应用程序启动方法<xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider>编译系统使用的实例。

trans-unit.source: For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider> class overview topic.
trans-unit.target: 有关所需要运行该示例的完整代码，请参阅示例部分<xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider>类概述主题。

trans-unit.source: Sets culture information for the current thread.
trans-unit.target: 设置当前线程的区域性信息。

trans-unit.source: Sets the current thread to the culture specified in the application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 将当前线程的区域性设置为应用程序配置文件中指定的区域性。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IDisposable" /> object that represents the culture prior to changing; this object can be used to revert to the previous culture.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示更改前的区域性的 <see cref="T:System.IDisposable" /> 对象；可使用此对象恢复到先前的区域性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.SetCultures%2A> method sets the current thread to the culture specified in the [globalization Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e2dffc8e-ebd2-439b-a2fd-e3ac5e620da7) element in the application's configuration file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.SetCultures%2A>方法将当前线程设置中指定的区域性[全球化元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e2dffc8e-ebd2-439b-a2fd-e3ac5e620da7)应用程序的配置文件中的元素。

trans-unit.source: The path that contains the culture information.
trans-unit.target: 包含区域性信息的路径。

trans-unit.source: Sets the current thread to the culture of the specified virtual path.
trans-unit.target: 将当前线程的区域性设置为指定虚拟路径的区域性。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IDisposable" /> object that represents the culture prior to changing; this object can be used to revert to the previous culture.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示更改前的区域性的 <see cref="T:System.IDisposable" /> 对象；可使用此对象恢复到先前的区域性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.SetCultures%2A> method sets the current thread to the culture that results after applying all elements in the configuration files affecting the specified virtual path.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.SetCultures%2A>方法将当前线程设置为结果应用影响指定的虚拟路径的配置文件中的所有元素后的区域性。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerated value that indicates why the application terminated.
trans-unit.target: 返回指示应用程序终止原因的枚举值。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.ApplicationShutdownReason" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.ApplicationShutdownReason" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the site.
trans-unit.target: 获取站点的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the site.
trans-unit.target: 站点的名称。

trans-unit.source: [Supported in the .NET Framework 4.5.1 only]
trans-unit.target: [仅在 .NET Framework 4.5.1 中受支持]

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the worker process or application pool associated with this host has stopped listening for new requests and will eventually shut down.
trans-unit.target: 当辅助进程或与该主机相关联的应用程序池已停止侦听新的请求，并将最终关闭时才发生。

trans-unit.source: When an application pool and its associated worker processes are being shut down by IIS, for example when an application pool has reached a scheduled recycle interval, IIS notifies the ASP.NET runtime that the application is shutting down and the worker process for the application pool stops listening for new requests.
trans-unit.target: 当应用程序池和其关联的工作进程将被关闭 IIS 时，例如当应用程序池已达到计划的回收间隔，IIS 通知应用程序正在关闭 ASP.NET 运行时和的工作进程应用程序池停止侦听新的请求。

trans-unit.source: Applications that use long-running requests, for example [SignalR](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=285432) applications, can listen for the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.StopListening> event and gracefully shut down their long-running operations when IIS has initiated the shutdown of an application pool and its associated worker processes.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序使用长时间运行的请求，例如[SignalR](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=285432)应用程序，可以侦听<xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.StopListening>事件和 IIS 已启动的应用程序关闭时正常关闭其长时间运行的操作池和其关联的工作进程。

trans-unit.source: There are several design considerations that a developer must consider when implementing the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.StopListening> event:
trans-unit.target: 有几个开发人员在实现时必须考虑的设计注意事项<xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.StopListening>事件：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.StopListening> event is only available for applications that are configured to use the IIS integrated pipeline.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.StopListening>事件功能仅适用于应用程序配置为使用 IIS 集成的管道。

trans-unit.source: Developers must not throw errors from their <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.StopListening> implementations; throwing errors will have unpredictable results.
trans-unit.target: 开发人员必须不会引发错误从其<xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.StopListening>实现; 引发错误将产生不可预知的结果。

trans-unit.source: Due to the concurrent nature of operations within ASP.NET, there is no guarantee that ASP.NET will call a <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.StopListening> event once it has been implemented by a developer.
trans-unit.target: 由于 ASP.NET 中的操作的并发特性，则不保证 ASP.NET 将调用<xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.StopListening>后它已由开发人员实现的事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.StopListening> event can execute concurrently with other <xref:System.Web.Hosting.IRegisteredObject> notifications.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.StopListening>事件可以执行与其他并发<xref:System.Web.Hosting.IRegisteredObject>通知。

trans-unit.source: Developers need to be aware that ASP.NET may shut down the application domain while their <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.StopListening> event is executing and design their implementations to handle that possibility.
trans-unit.target: 开发人员需要了解 ASP.NET 可能关闭应用程序域时其<xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.StopListening>执行事件并将其设计其实现来处理这种可能性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.StopListening> event handlers must not block; blocking implementations will result in deadlocks, and IIS will terminate the worker process when the rapid fail protection interval is reached.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.StopListening> 事件处理程序不能阻止;阻止实现将导致死锁，并达到快速失败保护时间间隔后，IIS 将终止该工作进程。

trans-unit.source: The object to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的对象。

trans-unit.source: Removes an object from the list of registered objects for the application.
trans-unit.target: 从应用程序的已注册对象列表中移除一个对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager> class enables methods outside the current application domain to create, manage, and destroy objects inside the current application domain.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager>类使当前的应用程序域，以创建、 管理和销毁当前的应用程序域内的对象之外的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.UnregisterObject%2A> method is used to remove previously registered objects from the hosting environment.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.UnregisterObject%2A>方法用于从宿主环境中删除以前注册的对象。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.IRegisteredObject.Stop%2A> method for a registered object.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例是<xref:System.Web.Hosting.IRegisteredObject.Stop%2A>已注册的对象的方法。

trans-unit.source: For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.IRegisteredObject> interface overview topic.
trans-unit.target: 有关所需要运行该示例的完整代码，请参阅示例部分<xref:System.Web.Hosting.IRegisteredObject>接口概述主题。

trans-unit.source: Gets the virtual path provider for this application.
trans-unit.target: 获取此应用程序的虚拟路径提供程序。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider" /> instance for this application.
trans-unit.target: 此应用程序的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: When more than one <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider> instance is registered, the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment> object manages the call chain.
trans-unit.target: 当多个<xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider>实例注册，<xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment>对象管理的调用链。

trans-unit.source: You cannot control the order in which virtual path providers are called.
trans-unit.target: 你无法控制在其中调用虚拟路径提供程序的顺序。
